name: Driving Academy 2018 Simulator
summary:
Road signs and driving made simpler – just for you! Enroll in this virtual school of driving called the Driving Academy 2018 Simulator, and master your driving and parking skills.

We bring to you the ultimate driving simulator, in which
you’ve to now drive and follow all the road signs. Don’t take the wrong turns, follow the signals, wear the seat belt – it’s your one stop to becoming a perfect driver.

Academy Mode: 
With 50+ unique road signs to learn and master, ace in the grand tests as well. It’s time to experience real-life driving lessons in Driving Academy 2018 Simulator.

Night Driving Mode: 25 levels of Night Driving will give you real-life experience of driving at night.

Challenges Mode: 25 unique challenges will give you reality check on everything you learnt in the Academy mode.

And it gets even better with a variety of cars you can learn to drive with – 50 different cars, choose your favorite and drive away.

Download Driving Academy 2018 Simulator @Games2Win from Apple App Store and let the fun begin!

Driving Academy 2018 Simulator Features: 
It’s time to experience real-life driving lessons!
- 50+ unique road signs to learn
- 100 levels to play, including the Grand Tests, Night Driving and Challenges 
- Free Drive to earn extra coins
- 3 different camera views
- Realistic driving mechanics
- 99+ different cars to drive
